query:
ALTER TABLE audit_logs 
DROP COLUMN entityType,
DROP COLUMN entityId,
ADD COLUMN organizationId INT AFTER userId,
ADD COLUMN resource VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown' AFTER organizationId,
ADD COLUMN resourceId INT AFTER resource,
MODIFY COLUMN action ENUM('create', 'read', 'update', 'delete') NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN status ENUM('success', 'failure') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'success' AFTER userAgent,
ADD COLUMN errorMessage TEXT AFTER status,
ADD INDEX org_idx (organizationId),
ADD INDEX resource_idx (resource, resourceId);
